short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add Steam revenue estimate to every Steam store page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows the estimated total revenue generated by a game on steam based on its price and total reviews using a simple algorithm. The price is shown in brackets after the games title in the currency shown on the page. The estimate is a guide only and should not be used in any financial planning.
